channel.title: Scriptural Way
channel.description: The Scriptural Way Bible studies seek to examine the scriptures and present the truth as seen in God's word. In all things, we must be seeking the scriptural way.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Scriptural Way Bible studies seek to examine the scriptures and present the truth as seen in God's word. In all things, we must be seeking the scriptural way.
channel.itunes:author: Seminole Pointe church of Christ
channel.itunes:keywords: Bible stuidy, scriptures, church of Christ, Seminole Pointe church of Christ, God, Holy Spirit, Jesus Christ

item.title: Episode 14 - January 26, 2010
item.description: In this episode, we began a new format as well as a new study topic. The topic: Are You A Partaker of the Divine Nature?
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, we began a new format as well as a new study topic. The topic: Are You A Partaker of the Divine Nature?

item.title: Episode 34 - June 15, 2010
item.description: This is the Scriptural Way Broadcast, episode 34. In this episode, we continued our study of lesson one, the Epistle to the Ephesians in our on study, The Armor of God. The current study comes from Ephesians 6:10-20. The Scriptural Way Broadcast is brought to you by the Seminole Pointe church of Christ located in Oklahoma City. See our website: www.seminolepointe.org for more information.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is the Scriptural Way Broadcast, episode 34. In this episode, we continued our study of lesson one, the Epistle to the Ephesians in our on study, The Armor of God. See our website: www.seminolepointe.org for more information.
